items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit, soft feel, good quality.
items.body: So cute! Love the ability to tighten around the wrists as large sleeves bug me. Read more
items.author: Allie, RDH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would purchase in other colors
items.body: Wore this to elegant night on a cruise. Was super cute. Subtle. And most importantly comfortable. True to size. Material was durable and thickness was just right to not feel cheap. Breathable with the cool breeze but maybe not for a summer day Read more
items.author: eefnash

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Dress
items.body: Absolutely sexy dress perfect fitting usually size large fits just like it should gorgeous and sexy. Would definitely get in different colors too so beautiful absolutely love stunning worth it’s value good price. Read more
items.author: Aly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit tighter than it seems!
items.body: I love this dress; it’s comfortable and versatile. The length and material are perfect. The only thing that bothered me personally (which is my own problem but keep in mind if you have a bit of a belly like me) is that it is a bit tighter in the midsection than I initially thought. I got it in black, which helps with hiding some of the chubbiness but I can definitely see it on the sides. For reference, I got a Medium, I’m 4’11, and about 135-140lbs. I have broad and kinda built shoulders but I love that this dress minimizes them a little bit. I do have an hourglass shape but my belly pops out a decent amount and it shows a lot in the dress. I guess I thought it was gonna be a bit of a looser fit, almost like a skater skirt just less flowy but it definitely hugs more than that. Read more
items.author: Patty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
items.body: The material is nice and heavy and it fits nicely. I’m super petite so the XS was perfect for me- if you’re more chesty I would size up. Read more
items.author: Britt

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way too big
items.body: I wanted to love it but it was way too big sadly. I ordered the smallest size and it was big. I’m 5’8” 123 lbs. The fabric and quality were great but I’m bummed it didn’t fit well on me Read more
items.author: Diane G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and comfy little black dress
items.body: For me this is the perfect little black dress. The fabric is soft and extra stretchy. It has a touch of elevated style from the slit and the sleeve detail. This is the "I have to go out but don't feel good in anything" dress! Knee high boots give it extra style. Heels make it dressier. Read more
items.author: CatiraVegas

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Grey Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
